item.title: Podman
item.description: I’ve read about Podman and been intrigued by it but never taken the time to install it and play around. This morning, walking with my dog, I listened to the almost-always-interesting Kubernetes Podcast and two of the principals behind Podman were on the show to discuss it. I decided to install it and use it in this week’s project. Here’s a working Podman deployment for gcp-oidc-token-proxy ACCOUNT="..." ENDPOINT="..." # Can't match container name i.
